name: REMORSE (girroni)
description:
A and D or <- and ->  to move 

E to talk and to leave rooms.

Keep an eye on the file directory after completing a loop

A short psychological horror about a kleptomaniac  bird. Made for the Black & White Game Jam for 2022.  

this was my first jam and  was very fun to make and let us know if you enjoy! :>

Avery Carpenter: God Artist & Animator

Min Hyune Bae: Lead Unity Crashing Bird

Ben Krussow: Audio Chimpanzee

Benay Daniel: Assistant Artist, and Lead Background Character
